name: ngrx-entity-relationship
description: Selector of related entities for @ngrx/entity and @ngrx/data

scripts.s:a: npm run s:a6 && npm run s:a7 && npm run s:a8 && npm run s:a9
scripts.s:a6: P=e2e/angular6/node_modules/ngrx-entity-relationship && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a7: P=e2e/angular7/node_modules/ngrx-entity-relationship && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a8: P=e2e/angular8/node_modules/ngrx-entity-relationship && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.s:a9: P=e2e/angular9/node_modules/ngrx-entity-relationship && rm -Rf $P && mkdir -p $P && cp -R dist $P && cp package.json $P
scripts.i:a6: cd e2e/angular6 && npm install && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a7: cd e2e/angular7 && npm install && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a8: cd e2e/angular8 && npm install && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a9: cd e2e/angular9 && npm install && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a: npm run i:a6 && npm run i:a7 && npm run i:a8 && npm run i:a9
scripts.b:a6: cd e2e/angular6 && npm run build -- --prod --progress=false && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a7: cd e2e/angular7 && npm run build -- --prod --progress=false && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a8: cd e2e/angular8 && npm run build -- --prod --progress=false && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a9: cd e2e/angular9 && npm run build -- --prod --progress=false && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a: npm run b:a6 && npm run b:a7 && npm run b:a8 && npm run b:a9
scripts.e2e:a: npm run e2e:a6 && npm run e2e:a7 && npm run e2e:a8 && npm run e2e:a9
scripts.e2e: npm run i:a && npm run s:a && npm run e2e:a

author: Michael Gusev <m@sudo.eu>

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && npm run lint && npm run test

scripts.prerelease: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build && npm run e2e && npm run b:a
